body: Radiation from small antennas, linear antenna characteristics, arrays of antennas, impedance concepts and measurements, multifrequency antennas, and aperture antennas.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: NONE)(Additional Attributes: Honors)
contentHtml: Radiation from small antennas, linear antenna characteristics, arrays of antennas, impedance concepts and measurements, multifrequency antennas, and aperture antennas.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: NONE)(Additional Attributes: Honors)
title: EE 438H: Antenna Engineering
